title: Authors and Citation
text: Machielsen B (2025). arci: Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals IV Regression R. R package version 0.0.1, https://basm92.github.io/arci/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {arci: Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for IV Regression in R},   author = {Bas Machielsen},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.1},   url = {https://basm92.github.io/arci/}, }

title: Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for IV Regression in R
text: ARCI R package create Anderson-Rubin confidence intervals instrumental variable regression models. function compatible models created feols function fixest package. Anderson-Rubin method robust weak instruments provides valid inference even instruments strongly correlated endogenous regressors. technical background, check blog post .

what: Calculate Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — ar_ci
title: Calculate Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — ar_ci
text: function calculates Anderson-Rubin (AR) confidence intervals specified endogenous variable IV regression estimated fixest::feols. robust weak instruments compatible models containing fixed effects.

title: Calculate Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — ar_ci
code: ar_ci(model, param, level = 0.95, grid_range = NULL, grid_length = 1000)

title: Calculate Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — ar_ci
text: model 'fixest' object resulting IV estimation. param character string specifying name endogenous variable. model one, can omitted. level confidence level required (e.g., 0.95 95% CI). grid_range numeric vector length 2, c(min, max), specifying range coefficient values test. NULL, default chosen. grid_length integer specifying number points grid test.

title: Calculate Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — ar_ci
text: Returns object class 'ar_ci' containing confidence interval, grid tested values, corresponding p-values.

what: For a regression table, get Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — get_ar_ci
title: For a regression table, get Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — get_ar_ci
text: function displays, calculating, Anderson-Rubin (AR) confidence intervals specified endogenous variable IV regression estimated fixest::feols. robust weak instruments compatible models containing fixed effects.

title: For a regression table, get Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — get_ar_ci
For a regression table, get Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — get_ar_ci
For a regression table, get Anderson-Rubin Confidence Intervals for fixest IV objects (Compatible with Fixed Effects) — get_ar_ci
text: Returns string representing Anderson-Rubin confidence interval.
